text: Colbie Caillat (born May 28, 1985) is an American pop music singer and songwriter. She was born in Malibu, California on May 28, 1985. Caillat grew up in Newbury Park, California. She currently lives in Malibu, California. Her song "Brighter than the Sun" was a hit. == References == Category:Singer- songwriters from California Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Malibu, California
title: Colbie Caillat
